statements: SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 100;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 50 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 100 AND price < 50;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM inventory WHERE item_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE item_name = 'Chair';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT item_name, price * quantity AS total_price FROM inventory WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity < 10 OR price > 50 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT item_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE id = 1;
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price >= 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT customer_name, product_id, order_date FROM Orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Inventory WHERE quantity > 10
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM Inventory WHERE price >= 50.00 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM Inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 20.00 AND 30.00
SELECT * FROM Orders JOIN Inventory ON Orders.product_id = Inventory.id WHERE Orders.customer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT product_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM Inventory GROUP BY product_name HAVING total_quantity > 50 ORDER BY total_quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, price FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, order_id, delivery_date, status FROM delivery WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY product_name ASC, quantity DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_name, delivery_date FROM orders INNER JOIN delivery ON orders.order_id = delivery.order_id WHERE delivery.status = 'delivered'
SELECT product_name, quantity, price FROM inventory WHERE price > 50 AND quantity < 100 ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, order_date FROM orders WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' OR customer_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT product_name, quantity*price AS total_price FROM inventory ORDER BY total_price DESC
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE price > 50;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, item_id, quantity FROM order_items ORDER BY order_id ASC, item_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory ORDER BY item_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT customer_name, total_amount FROM customers JOIN orders ON customers.customer_id = orders.customer_id WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT item_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM inventory GROUP BY item_name HAVING total_quantity > 50;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(total_amount) AS avg_amount FROM orders GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY avg_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50 ORDER BY price;
SELECT * FROM inventory;
SELECT product_name, quantity FROM inventory WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT order_id, product_id, quantity, unit_price FROM order_items WHERE quantity > 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT product_name, quantity, unit_price FROM inventory WHERE unit_price > 50;
SELECT order_id, order_date, total_amount FROM orders WHERE status = 'Shipped' ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT customers.first_name, customers.last_name, addresses.city, addresses.postal_code FROM customers INNER JOIN addresses ON customers.customer_id = addresses.customer_id;
